Title: Binetsu Shoukougun
Description: ["Some of life's lessons, tuition just can't buy! The beautiful Miss Mizuki works at a private college, counseling students and teachers alike. With student after student confiding in her, telling of their secret passions and erotic escapades, nurse Mizuki has a hard time controlling herself!"]
Related: ['Adaptation: Shokuzai no Kyoushitsu: Bad End', 'Alternative setting: Shokuzai no Kyoushitsu']
